physical_examinations.relevant_findings: An 18-year-old white woman presented with discrete, white, adherent nodules scattered throughout her hair. Clinical examination revealed no scalp erythema or alopecia, with genital hair, eyelashes, and eyebrows unaffected.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After 5 months of therapy with Nizoral shampoo, the white piedra resolved.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: A 15-year-old white female presented with the same discreet, white, adherent nodules scattered throughout her scalp hair. Other hair-bearing areas were not affected.
